artist: Author: Da'Shen; Publisher: Arctype Press, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a woman in the sea wearing a crown of chains printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 26 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Feral Tides
